      AIOperation Ocelot.processFortify(AIController api)
      This Ocelot will move all its units to the country that it can use to attack the most neighbouring countries.

      This Monkey will move all its units to the country that it can use to attack the most neighbouring countries.

      This FinalBoss will move all its units to the country that it can use to attack the most neighbouring countries.
      AIOperation Ocelot.processReinforce(AIController api)
      This Ocelot will reinforce all its countries that border with hostile countries based on the size of the enemy armies at those countries.
      AIOperation Monkey.processReinforce(AIController api)
      This Monkey will reinforce all its countries that border with hostile countries based on the size of the enemy armies at those countries.
      AIOperation FinalBoss.processReinforce(AIController api)
      This FinalBoss will reinforce all its countries.
